mapper.select: select f.free_board_id as freeBoardId, f.free_board_title as freeBoardTitle,f.free_board_content as freeBoardContent, m.member_name as memberName, to_char(f.free_board_create,'YYYY-MM-DD') as freeBoardCreate from free_board f join member m on f.member_id = m.member_id order by free_board_id desc

SELECT f.free_board_id, f.free_board_title, f.free_board_content, f.free_board_create, f.free_board_views, f.free_board_file_name, m.member_name FROM free_board f JOIN member m ON f.member_id = m.member_id WHERE f.free_board_id = #{freeBoardId}

SELECT fbc.FREE_BOARD_COMMENT_ID, fbc.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_NAME, fbc.FREE_BOARD_COMMENT_CONTENT, to_char( fbc.FREE_BOARD_COMMENT_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as freeBoardCommentDate FROM FREE_BOARD_COMMENT fbc INNER JOIN MEMBER m ON fbc.MEMBER_ID = m.MEMBER_ID WHERE fbc.FREE_BOARD_ID = #{freeBoardId} ORDER BY fbc.FREE_BOARD_COMMENT_ID DESC
